select a.user_account clientAccount, a.user_name clientName, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.email clientEmail, a.id_card idCard, a.user_code userId, a.version version from t_sys_user a, t_sys_client b where a.is_deleted=0 and a.role=3 and a.user_code=b.user_id
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{clientName}, '%')
and a.user_account like concat('%',#{clientAccount},'%')
order by a.update_time desc
